songs.title: Boomerang
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Daniel Seavey]
Throw it back to you, girl
Go ahead and make your move
You a star in your own world
And the sky opens up for you

[Refrain: Jack Avery]
Mama said that they come through and go
She's got everything she needs to know to come back for you
She'll come back to you

[Pre-Chorus: Jonah Marais]
Gone with the wind, girl
Cut through the clouds, don't you dare me, I will
Nobody wins, yeah
You'll end up, right back here, right back here, right back

[Chorus: Zach Herron]
I let you go, I set you free
Like boomerang, you come back to me
I let you go, I set you free
Like boomerang, you come back to me

[Post-Chorus]
Like boomerang, you come back to me
Like boomerang, you come back to me

[Verse 2: Daniel Seavey]
Come back to me, girl
You don't gotta change your mind
Be what you would be, girl
Everybody needs some time

[Refrain: Jack Avery]
Mama said that they come through and go
She's got everything she needs to know to come back for you
She'll come back to you

[Pre-Chorus: Corbyn Besson]
Gone with the wind, girl
Cut through the clouds, don't you dare me, I will
Nobody wins, yeah
You'll end up, right back here, right back here, right back

[Chorus: Zach Herron]
I let you go, I set you free
Like boomerang, you come back to me
I let you go, I set you free
Like boomerang, you come back to me

[Post-Chorus]
Like boomerang, you come back to me
Like boomerang, you come back to me
